title: Definition
text: The augmented matrix displays the coefficients of the variables, and an additional column for the constants.
speech: The augmented matrix displays the coefficients of the variables, and an additional column for the constants.

title: Write
text: The first row has the values 4,-3,11.

title: Answer
speech: The answer is  the 2 by 3 matrix row 1 4, negative 3, 11 row 2 3, 2, 4 .
